name: react-code-to-do-list-
description: // local storage as, with if-else     function saveTask(addtask){         let tasks;         if(localStorage.getItem('tasks')){             tasks=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('tasks'))         }         else{             tasks=[]         }         tasks.push(addtask)         localStorage.setItem('tasks',JSON.stringify(tasks))     }
